author: alex
msg: Clean up logging, remove printStackTrace and System.out.println
servlet log message prepends name of context

author: alex
msg: Clean up logging, remove printStackTrace and System.out.println
BaseInterceptor now provides useable log() methods, so all subclasses
can call log() directly

author: alex
msg: Clean up logging behavior, remove printStackTrace()s
Outputting servlet exception as HTML now uses
Logger.throwableToString() -- Prints nested exceptions for
ServletException, TomcatException, and SQLException

author: alex
msg: Set servlet_log to be verbosity INFORMATION so servlets calling
context.log() get their messages to show up by default

author: shemnon
msg: Generalized maintinence
* A bug with -webapp and no -uriroot and -uribase fixed
(found by Stephen Zhou <szhou on an email server named entricom.com>)
* removed some "};" sequences breaking forte (a habit I picked up in
my pascal days
* unified some error messages to use the logger and the resource bundle
